law.catch_line: This part applies to an investor-owned electric company that has an obligation to provide standard o...
law.text: This part applies to an investor-owned electric company that has an obligation to provide standard offer service under § 7-510(c) of this subtitle to residential electric customers for whom rate cap or price freeze service established under a settlement agreement approved in accordance with § 7-505(d) of this subtitle expires at the end of June 30, 2006.
